full_description:
LDNIO PQ13 10000mAh 22.5W Power Bank

The LDNIO PQ13 10000mAh 22.5W Power Bank is designed to deliver reliable power on the road. This power bank has a massive 10000mAh capacity, ensuring that your gadgets stay charged throughout the day. It has built-in USB-C and Lightning cables, providing adaptability and removing the need to carry additional cords, making it suitable for both Android and iOS smartphones. The PQ13 has a remarkable 18W input and 22.5W output, allowing for quick charging of a wide range of devices, including smartphones and tablets. The PQ13 power bank has a simple push button and an LED display, allowing you to see the remaining battery life and charging progress at a glance. The LDNIO PQ13 is built with high-quality battery components for long-lasting performance and safe charging cycles. The LDNIO PQ13 power bank also comes with a handy silicone lanyard, which improves mobility and allows you to take it with you wherever you go. With the huge capacity of LDNIO PQ13, rapid charging capabilities, and smart design elements, the LDNIO PQ13 10000mAh 22.5W Power Bank is a must-have item for staying charged when on the go. The LDNIO PQ13 is designed with high-quality battery components to assure safety, dependability, and a long lifespan. This LDNIO PQ13 Power bank is built to withstand several charging cycles while still providing excellent performance. It also includes a silicone lanyard for increased convenience while traveling, commuting, or simply moving between rooms. With its huge capacity, quick charging capabilities, built-in connections, and user-friendly features, the LDNIO PQ13 10000mAh 22.5W Power Bank is a must-have device for everyone who need dependable power on the road.
